description.value:
Trigger Your shield is raised and an adjacent ally Raises a Shield.

You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade. Both you and the triggering creature have @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Cover]{Standard Cover} as long as you remain adjacent to each other and you both have your shields raised; when this is no longer the case, the effect ends. You and your ally can't use this cover to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide]{Hide}, as it's obvious you're standing there holding your shields, but you and your ally can use it to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Take Cover]{Take Cover}. Normally, if you and your ally don't move, Shield Wall lasts until the beginning of your next turn, when your shield is no longer raised.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
